comments:
Created an attachment (id=78283)
A simple class to reproduce the problem

BIRT fails in emitting postscript. Other formats work, but the same code (with only changing the output format). Here's the relevant part of the log:

Attached is a source file with which this can be reproduced.


Also see this newsgroup thread: http://dev.eclipse.org/newslists/news.eclipse.birt/msg22202.html
Do you changed the font configs in the org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.fonts plugin? The file is encoded in UTF-8, so you should use a XML editor to edit this file.

(In reply to comment #1)
> Do you changed the font configs in the org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.fonts
> plugin? 

I'm pretty sure I haven't touched that file.

There is a error in the org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.fonts/fontsConfig_postscript.xml, it should be removed or append following line at the bottom of file:

<font/>


This bug won't break the postscript report generation.

It has been fixed in 2.2.1 and following releases.

thanks.
